tier.item: `I'll go a long way off.' (Wurm & Hercus 1976:40)
`I'll go a long way off.' (Wurm & Hercus 1976:40)
I'll go a long way off.
`It was him that carried the small children.' (ibid., 42)
`It was him that carried the small children.' (ibid., 42)

`A lot of people buried themselves (in quicksand).' (Hercus 1982:203, ex. 550)

`They'll go back to their country.' (Wurm & Hercus 1976:41)
`They'll go back to their country.' (Wurm & Hercus 1976:41)
They'll go back to their country.
